name: Big Collision Games
overview: Dublin, Ireland-based Big Collision Games is led by Marty Brickey, CEO; Greg Chadwell, executive vice president; and Michael Turner, vice president of business development. BCG is focused on bringing free-to-play massively multi-player online games to underserved market segments worldwide. Big Collision Games is a Big World Technology licensee and believes in leveraging middleware to create outstanding products, allowing the focus to remain on providing an excellent customer experience.
